meanings.definition: A broadcast of sports events on radio or television.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to the sportscast on the radio.
meanings.sent2: The sportscast on TV covered all the latest games.
meanings.sent3: The sportscast made me feel like I was at the stadium!
meanings.sent4: Her voice on the sportscast painted a vivid picture of the game.
meanings.sent5: The sportscast brought the excitement of the match right into my living room.

meanings.definition: To broadcast sports events on radio or television.
meanings.sent1: They will sportscast the basketball game live tonight.
meanings.sent2: He sportscasts all the major football matches.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if I could sportscast a game one day.
meanings.sent4: She sportscasts with such enthusiasm and knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Sportscasting requires a good understanding of the game and clear communication skills.
